poke.note: Test that Peon Discord bot is available.

get.note: Get a specific game server's details.

getall.note: Get a list of all hosts and servers on those hosts.

plan.note: Get the requirements for a specific game plan.

plans.note: Get a list of available game server recipes.

register.note: Register an Orchestrator as a usable host.

start.note: Start a game server (Optionally adding a duration/shutdown time for the game session).

stop.note: Stop a game server (Optionally, delay the stop by a specific duration/to a specific time).

usage.note: How to use the Peon Discord bot.

bad.code.note: Please consider logging a ticket with the developer. Visit: https://github.com/the-peon-project/peon-bot-discord/issues/new/choose

auth.note: This channel is not authorized to run this command.
